title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 07/28/2018
itunes:title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 07/28/2018
description:
Colin talks to organizer, producer, and co-author of The Last Master Outlaw, Tom Colbert. They discuss the infamous case of D.B. Cooper and how his team believes they have pinpointed the perpetrator. Through first-hand accounts, in-depth research, and legal action against the FBI, Colbert and his team take down one of the greatest stories in American true crime history.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
